title: Million Dollar QB?
description:
Wendi Nix, Sam Acho, and David Pollack discuss the impact OU and Texas could have on the playoffs and recruiting as well as the effect NIL could have on the locker room.

itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The CFB Live crew discuss more impacts from OU and Texas' request to join the SEC.
